nodes.text: The Both system, Bothawui system or Bothan system was a star system located within the Bothan sector of the Mid Rim region of the galaxy. Containing a number of planets, including Bothawui and Golm, Crev Bombaasa was in charge of Hutt operations there.

The databank in the game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds claims that the Both system also contains the planet Krant. If the system contains some unknown planets, or Krant is to be identified with one of the aforementioned names has not been resolved. Other sources say that Krant is not in the Mid Rim at all, but the Outer Rim.
